I usually add the latest albums from Pitchfork & Any Decent Music? to a Spotify playlist named month/year.  After a few listens of each album I decided if I like it and will keep listening to it for the rest of the month, or delete it.  I always end up with a good playlist by the end of the month :)

Here is what I'm listening to for January 2014...

http://open.spotify.com/user/joe_carney/playlist/32NPWYestas3kmoXQ77108

http://8tracks.com/tapemixtape/new-indie-jan-14-o-o - presently.
